summary: Email correspondence between Assistant U.S. Attorneys in the Southern District of New York discussing a request for a memo template related to the Epstein case. One attorney is assigned to write a DAG memo on Epstein and asks another for a document previously written for the 'M case' as a formatting reference.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the initial email requesting a memo template related to the Epstein case, referencing an assignment to write a DAG memo on Epstein.

events.title: Request for Epstein Memo Template
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney requests a memo template from a colleague to assist in writing a DAG memo on the Epstein case, referencing a prior document from the 'M case'.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York was assigned to write a DAG memo on Jeffrey Epstein in February 2019.
The attorney requested a memo template from a colleague, referencing a document previously prepared for the 'M case' for format, length, and style guidance.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal work and preparation related to the Epstein case within the U.S. Attorney's Office in early 2019.
